description: The agent generates this notification when a rept
alarm or rept evt is generated.

Summary.eval: ($v6 == 2) ? 'Service affecting event on $v1 : $v9' : (($v6 == 3) ? 'Non service affecting event on $v1 : $v9' : 'Event on $v1 : $v9')

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FNCNMS::nmsNEEvent FNCNMS::notifTID s EXAMPLE FNCNMS::neEntityID s EXAMPLE FNCNMS::neEntityType s EXAMPLE FNCNMS::neSeverity i 1 FNCNMS::neCondType s EXAMPLE FNCNMS::neServEffect i 1 FNCNMS::neLocation i 1 FNCNMS::neDirection i 1 FNCNMS::neCondDescription s EXAMPLE FNCNMS::nmsNotifTimeStamp s EXAMPLEE FNCNMS::neNotifTimeStamp s EXAMPLEE FNCNMS::nmsTrapSeqNumber i 9999

description: NE TID against which this notification is being sent.
@see NMSMgdNE.
variables.name: FNCNMS::notifTID

description: Describes the AID of the entity against which this
notification is being sent.
variables.name: FNCNMS::neEntityID

description: Describes the type the entity against which this
notification is being sent . The combination (neEntityID,neEntityType)
represents a addressable entity on the network element.
Examples of neEntityType would be EQPT,OC3,COM,STS1,ENV etc.
variables.name: FNCNMS::neEntityType

description: Describes the severity of the notification being sent.
@see NMSSeverity.
variables.name: FNCNMS::neSeverity

description: Describes the condition type i.e RMVD or LOS etc.
variables.name: FNCNMS::neCondType

description: Describes whether the notification is ServiceAffecting
or not.
@see NMSServiceEffect.
variables.name: FNCNMS::neServEffect

description: Describes if the location is applicable for this
notification, if it is applicable describes the location.
@see NMSCondLocation.
variables.name: FNCNMS::neLocation

description: Describes if the direction is a applicable and if
it is applicable the direction.
@see NMSCondDirection.
variables.name: FNCNMS::neDirection

description: Textual Description of the notification.
variables.name: FNCNMS::neCondDescription

description: Time when NMS received this event.
variables.name: FNCNMS::nmsNotifTimeStamp

description: Time when NE raised this event.
variables.name: FNCNMS::neNotifTimeStamp

description: @See NMSTrapSeqNumber.
variables.name: FNCNMS::nmsTrapSeqNumber

description: The agent generates this notification when a NMS
changes its connection state to the NE.
@see NMSConnState.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FNCNMS::nmsNEStateChangeEvent FNCNMS::notifTID s EXAMPLE FNCNMS::nmsNEConnState i 1 FNCNMS::nmsTrapSeqNumber i 9999

description: NE TID against which this notification is being sent.
@see NMSMgdNE.
variables.name: FNCNMS::notifTID

description: Describes the state of connection between
an NE and NMS.
variables.name: FNCNMS::nmsNEConnState

description: @See NMSTrapSeqNumber.
variables.name: FNCNMS::nmsTrapSeqNumber

description: The agent generates this notification when a NE is
created or deleted.
@see neOperation.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FNCNMS::nmsNEOperationEvent FNCNMS::notifTID s EXAMPLE FNCNMS::neOperation i 1 FNCNMS::nmsTrapSeqNumber i 9999

description: NE TID against which this notification is being sent.
@see NMSMgdNE.
variables.name: FNCNMS::notifTID

description: Indicates if a new NE is added to NETSMART
or if it is removed. Addition always implies a nmsNEConnState with
value notConnected and NEType of Unknown.
variables.name: FNCNMS::neOperation

description: @See NMSTrapSeqNumber.
variables.name: FNCNMS::nmsTrapSeqNumber

description: The agent generates this notification when reaching
the keep alive trap interval.
@see nmsKeepAliveState.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FNCNMS::nmsKeepAliveEvent FNCNMS::notifServer s EXAMPLE FNCNMS::nmsKeepAliveState i 1

description: Describes the Server which this
notification is being sent.
variables.name: FNCNMS::notifServer

description: Describes the keep alive state which this
notification is being sent.
variables.name: FNCNMS::nmsKeepAliveState
